name: Array Sum Pairs
description: Given an array of integers and a target value, find all pairs of elements in the array that sum to the target value. Return an array of arrays, where each inner array contains a pair of numbers that sum to the target. Each pair should only be included once, and the order of pairs doesn't matter.
runnerCode:
def run_test(input_string):
    lines = input_string.strip().split('\n')
    array = list(map(int, lines[0].split()))
    target = int(lines[1])
    
    # User will implement find_pairs function
    result = find_pairs(array, target)
    
    # Convert result to string format matching the expected output
    return str(result)
